problems.title: $7,500 Damage Claim
problems.description: A poorly trained valet caused $7,500 in damage to a handicap vehicle on 4/25, highlighting the cost of inadequate training.
problems.impact: Significant financial loss, negative guest experience, and increased insurance liability.
problems.solution: Implement mandatory, assessed training with specific modules for vehicle types and a BDT for handling exceptions.

problems.title: Lost Keys
problems.description: Reliance on sticky notes for room numbers leads to key loss, guest frustration, and incorrect billing.
problems.impact: Guest dissatisfaction, revenue loss from incorrect billing, and operational inefficiencies.
problems.solution: Implement Revised Call-Down Logs & Key Tracking for clear chain of custody.

problems.title: No Training
problems.description: Six new valets with zero experience from the 'new training program' were useless, unable to write tickets or perform basic functions.
problems.impact: Poor guest service, increased training costs, and operational disruption.
problems.solution: Develop a formal 2-4 hour initial training program and designate 'Mentor Valets' to ensure consistency.

problems.title: Staffing Gap Over-spend
problems.description: Current inefficiencies and turnover contribute to staffing gap bonuses exceeding $3,000 per month.
problems.impact: Excessive operational costs and reduced profitability.
problems.solution: Implement consistent consequences for lateness and no-shows, which currently often go unaddressed.

problems.title: Disorganized Key Basket
problems.description: Current key management system lacks proper organization and tracking, leading to delays and lost keys.
problems.impact: Increased car retrieval times, guest frustration, and potential security risks.
problems.solution: Implement Revised Call-Down Logs & Key Tracking for clear chain of custody.

problems.title: Taxi Congestion on Ramp
problems.description: Lack of clear procedures for taxi management creates bottlenecks and conflicts on the ramp.
problems.impact: Operational delays, guest inconvenience, and increased stress for valets.
problems.solution: Provide valets with pre-printed cards with QR codes and instructions for taxi drivers.

problems.title: Complex Parking Decisions
problems.description: Valets struggle with parking decisions for oversized vehicles and special situations without clear guidelines.
problems.impact: Inefficient space utilization, potential damage, and inconsistent service.
problems.solution: Introduce Binary Decision Trees (BDTs) to guide valets through common scenarios, ensuring consistent, efficient actions.

problems.title: Inconsistent Procedures
problems.description: Different valets handle similar situations differently, leading to confusion and quality issues.
problems.impact: Inconsistent guest experience, training difficulties, and operational inefficiencies.
problems.solution: Document & Implement Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for all key tasks and scenarios.

problems.title: White Ticket Revenue Loss
problems.description: Incorrect time stamping for hourly parking results in lost revenue opportunities.
problems.impact: Daily revenue loss estimated at $7+ per white ticket through inaccurate billing.
problems.solution: Optimize 'White Ticket' (Hourly) Process: Mandate time stamping immediately upon guest arrival.

problems.title: Equipment Shortage
problems.description: Valets often lack basic equipment like clickers, proper pens, and key rings needed for efficient operations.
problems.impact: Reduced operational efficiency, unprofessional appearance, and frustrated employees.
problems.solution: Standardize equipment availability with proper tracking and deposit systems.

solutions.title: Formal Initial Training Program
solutions.description: Create a 2-4 hour mandatory group session covering 'The ACE Way,' core procedures, customer service scripts, and safety protocols.
solutions.benefit: Reduces training inconsistencies and ensures all valets have baseline competencies
solutions.roi: Reduces damage claims by 60% and improves guest satisfaction scores

solutions.title: Mentor Valet Program
solutions.description: Pair new hires with experienced, designated 'Mentor Valets' for structured guidance during initial weeks.
solutions.benefit: Ensures consistent knowledge transfer and reduces new hire turnover
solutions.roi: Reduces turnover costs by 40% and accelerates new hire productivity

solutions.title: Standard Operating Procedures
solutions.description: Document clear SOPs for all key tasks including ramp management, damage checks, and parking methods.
solutions.benefit: Creates consistency across all operations and reduces errors
solutions.roi: Reduces operational errors by 50% and improves efficiency

solutions.title: Binary Decision Trees
solutions.description: Create simple, visual decision trees for common scenarios to guide consistent decision-making.
solutions.benefit: Eliminates guesswork and ensures consistent responses to common situations
solutions.roi: Reduces decision-making time by 30% and improves consistency

solutions.title: Key Tracking System
solutions.description: Implement revised call-down logs and key tracking to establish clear chain of custody.
solutions.benefit: Eliminates lost keys and improves billing accuracy
solutions.roi: Reduces key-related incidents by 90% and improves guest satisfaction

solutions.title: Performance Tracking & Reporting
solutions.description: Systematically track performance using data-driven metrics and provide regular feedback.
solutions.benefit: Enables objective performance management and identifies improvement opportunities
solutions.roi: Increases productivity by 25% and reduces management time
